overview: Mo'Nique is a shining star that gets brighter as she continues to illuminate the world of entertainment. UPN sitcom star, stand- up comedienne, author, model and designer, Mo'Nique is the first female host of the historic late night variety show, "It's Showtime at the Apollo!"
tagline: Mo'Nique is a shining star that gets brighter as she continues to illuminate the world of entertainment
title: Mo'Nique: One Night Stand
